LightningComponentBundle.description: A dynamic, highly customizable navigation tiles component with multiple styles, animations, and layout options

property.name: columns
property.label: Number of Columns
property.description: Number of tiles to display per row

property.name: delimiter
property.label: Delimiter
property.description: Delimiter for character-delimited lists. Default is comma (,)

property.name: titles
property.label: Tile Titles
property.description: Comma-separated list of tile titles. Each title appears as the main heading on the tile. Example: Home, Reports, Settings

property.name: descriptions
property.label: Tile Descriptions
property.default: Description of feature 1, Description of feature 2, Description of feature 3
property.description: Comma-separated list of tile descriptions. Optional text that appears below the title. Leave empty for no description. Example: Access dashboard, View analytics, Manage preferences

property.name: icons
property.label: Tile Icons
property.description: Comma-separated list of SLDS icon names. Format: category:name (e.g., utility:download, standard:account, custom:custom1). Leave empty for no icon. Full list: https://lightningdesignsystem.com/icons/

property.name: colors
property.label: Tile Accent Colors
property.description: Comma-separated list of hex color codes for each tile. Controls the tile's accent color based on the selected style. Example: #FF6900, #0071e3, #34c759

property.name: links
property.label: Tile Links (Navigation URLs)
property.description: Comma-separated list of URLs for navigation. SUPPORTED FORMATS: 1) External sites: www.usda.gov, https://example.com, example.org (automatically opens in new tab); 2) Salesforce pages: /lightning/page/home, /apex/CustomPage; 3) Named pages: home, chatter; 4) JSON navigation: {"type":"standard__objectPage","attributes":{"objectApiName":"Account","actionName":"list"}}. Leave empty to use static resource download instead.

property.name: bgImages
property.label: Background Images (Optional)
property.description: Comma-separated list of image URLs for tile backgrounds. Leave empty for solid color background. Example: https://example.com/image1.jpg, , https://example.com/image3.jpg (second tile has no background image). Images will have a dark overlay for text readability.

property.name: staticResources
property.label: Static Resource Downloads (Optional)
property.description: Comma-separated list of Salesforce Static Resource API names for file downloads. When set, clicking the tile downloads the file instead of navigating. EXAMPLE: UserManual, , CompanyLogo = tile 1 downloads UserManual file, tile 2 uses its link, tile 3 downloads CompanyLogo. NOTE: Static resources take priority over links. Files download with their original format (PDF, ZIP, etc.).

property.name: primaryColor
property.label: Primary Color
property.description: Primary color for theme elements (matches theme layout)

property.name: accentColor
property.label: Accent Color
property.description: Accent color for highlights (matches theme layout)
